snippet.title: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising – Beatrix Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Permission to get reckless: granted. Beatrix, the Undying Blue, is the next playable DLC character coming to Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising on May 23, 2024!

DLC Details ⬇️
https://rising.granbluefantasy.jp/en/dlc/character/

Official Website - Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising (English)
https://rising.granbluefantasy.jp/en/

Official GBVS Series X Account (formerly Twitter)
https://x.com/gbvs_official

#GranblueFantasyVersus #GBVS #GBVSR #Cygames #Beatrix
